titre: Easy DIY Self Measuring Tape Hack | One Hand Take Own Measurements Easily
intro: This is a super easy hack done on a regular tape measure into a self-measuring tape measure so anyone needing to take self-measurements can do it easily with one hand. It is a super handy tool for sewing, crafts, or anything that needs measuring without a second hand to help.
